channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: A string of dangerous potholes along Priors Road, 26th November
item.description:
Large number of potholes on Priors Road that are avoided by cars and cyclists by performing very dangerous manoeuvres.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Priors Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water continualy runs accross the carriageway, and has caused ice to form due to the current freezing conditions. I am aware of at least one car that has lost control at the location., 26th November
item.description:
Water runs continually from the Dowdeswell junction on to the A40, and is causing ice to form due to the current freezing conditions.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dowdeswell, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Path from Green to Lobleys drive, 26th November
item.description:
Is in poor condition with high levels of detritus and leaf mould and no sign of having been cleaned for in recent weeks. I’d appreciate if you could arrange to get this cleared and added to your routine maintenance schedule.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unpermitted creation of a driveway, 26th November
item.description:
Potentially illegal creation of a dropped curb by property resident. Resident has created a ‘driveway’ and intends to access their new ‘drive’ by cutting up the council owned existing curb and pavement which is being carried out now (26th Nov 23). There are no signs permitting the works, no fencing to keep the public safe and offering an alternative safe walkway. Drive is being created by resident so unlikely to have council approval.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westfield Avenue, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.description:
Walking out of Cox’s Meadow along the foot path to “What 3 words position. Stir.aware.orchestra

item.title: Bin overflowing, 26th November
item.description:
Bin overflowing again. Please either empty it more regularly or replace with a bigger one.. It is always overflowing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 107, Church Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins overflowing, 26th November
item.description:
The bins at Burrows Field and the play area are overflowing and insufficient for the amount of waste created. The rubbish is spilling into the play area. Please can the bins be emptied regularly and replaced by larger ones.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Moorend Grove, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 14 potholes some dangerous to bikes and damage vehicles, 26th November
item.description:
Between Bramley Road and Orchard Avenue going up to Coronation Square there are 14 potholes some very large. These have been there for sometime and getting worse each day. They are danger to bike/motorcycles and will seriously damage cars as you need to swerve to avoid.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 319, Princess Elizabeth Way, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Debris on cycle lane., 25th November
item.description:
New cycle way unusable as a lot of debris from main road and hedges has accumulated along it's length making it a puncture risk if used. Also standing water when it has rained lots.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bridleway overgrown by brambles and nettles. Very narrow. Branch over path at about 4 ft height. Impassable on horse or bike, 25th November
item.description:
Bridleway from far Stanley to top of hill is very narrow due to overgrown brambles and nettles and fallen branches, and very muddy. Dangerous to walk down and impassable on horse or bike

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Prescott, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drains cause ice on B4632 outside Malvern View Hotel, 25th November
item.description:
The problem reported on the B4632 two weeks ago of blocked drains exuding water is now an ice making machine with ice on carriageway Location by top of post office lane and outside Malvern View hotel

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4632, Woodmancote, Tewkesbury

item.title: Pavement collapsed, 24th November
item.description:
The tarmac on the pavement has collapsed inwards. An uneven - jagged surface that is a dangerous trip hazard, especially as it’s just along from the bus stop.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Hatherley Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
